mapper.select: select moviecd,title,director,actor,opendt,runtime,genre,plot,poster,audiacc from MovieDB where moviecd IN ( select moviecd from MovieWishList where member_no = #{member_no} )
select moviecd,title,director,actor,opendt,runtime,genre,plot,poster,audiacc from MovieDB where audiacc > 180000 order by opendt desc, audiacc desc limit 5
mapper.delete: delete from MovieWishList where member_no = #{member_no} and moviecd = #{moviecd}
mapper.select: select Mem.member_id,Movie.movie_rate,Movie.movie_reply from MovieRate Movie join Member Mem on Movie.member_no = Mem.member_no where Movie.moviecd = #{moviecd}
select count(*) from MovieWishList where member_no = #{member_no} and moviecd = #{moviecd}
